right.value: Error reason to specify the time error that occurs in the module
Specifies the time format defined by the RFC-1123

documentation.left: Record type to hold the details of an error.
The time format defined by the RFC-1123.
Ballerina TimeZone represents the time-zone information associated with a particular time.
Ballerina Time represents a particular time with its associated time-zone.

right.value:
**Package:** _ballerina/time_  
  
Returns ISO 8601 string representation of the given time.
  
**Params**  
- `time:Time` time: The Time record to be converted to string  
  
**Returns** `string`   
- The ISO 8601 formatted string of the given time

**Package:** _ballerina/time_  
  
Returns formatted string representation of the given time.
  
**Params**  
- `time:Time` time: The Time record to be formatted  
- `(string|RFC_1123)` timeFormat: The format which is used to format the time represented by this object  
  
**Returns** `(string|time:Error)`   
- The formatted string of the given time or an `time:Error` if failed to format the time

**Package:** _ballerina/time_

items.label: addDuration(time:Time time, int years, int months, int days, int hours, int minutes, int seconds, int milliSeconds)(time:Time)

right.value:
**Package:** _ballerina/time_  
  
Add specified durations to the given time value.
  
**Params**  
- `time:Time` time: The Time record to add the duration to  
- `int` years: The year representation  
- `int` months: The month-of-year to represent, from 1 (January) to 12 (December)  
- `int` days: The day-of-month to represent, from 1 to 31  
- `int` hours: The hour-of-day to represent, from 0 to 23  
- `int` minutes: The minute-of-hour to represent, from 0 to 59  
- `int` seconds: The second-of-minute to represent, from 0 to 59  
- `int` milliSeconds: The milli-of-second to represent, from 0 to 999  
  
**Returns** `time:Time`   
- Time object containing time and zone information after the addition

items.label: subtractDuration(time:Time time, int years, int months, int days, int hours, int minutes, int seconds, int milliSeconds)(time:Time)

right.value:
**Package:** _ballerina/time_  
  
Subtract specified durations from the given time value.
  
**Params**  
- `time:Time` time: The Time record to subtract the duration from  
- `int` years: The year representation  
- `int` months: The month-of-year to represent, from 1 (January) to 12 (December)  
- `int` days: The day-of-month to represent, from 1 to 31  
- `int` hours: The hour-of-day to represent, from 0 to 23  
- `int` minutes: The minute-of-hour to represent, from 0 to 59  
- `int` seconds: The second-of-minute to represent, from 0 to 59  
- `int` milliSeconds: The milli-of-second to represent, from 0 to 999  
  
**Returns** `time:Time`   
- Time object containing time and zone information after the subtraction

**Package:** _ballerina/time_  
  
Change the time-zone of the given time.
  
**Params**  
- `time:Time` time: The Time record of which the time-zone to be changed  
- `string` zoneId: The new time-zone id  
  
**Returns** `(time:Time|time:Error)`   
- Time object containing time and zone information after the conversion  
           or an `time:Error` if failed to format the time

**Package:** _ballerina/time_  
  
Returns the current time value with the system default time-zone.
  
  
  
**Returns** `time:Time`   
- Time object containing the time and zone information

**Package:** _ballerina/time_  
  
Returns the current system time in nano seconds.
  
  
  
**Returns** `int`   
- Int value of the current system time in nano seconds

items.label: createTime(int year, int month, int date, int hour, int minute, int second, int milliSecond, string zoneId)((time:Time|time:Error))

right.value:
**Package:** _ballerina/time_  
  
Returns the Time object correspoding to the given time components and time-zone.
  
**Params**  
- `int` year: The year representation  
- `int` month: The month-of-year to represent, from 1 (January) to 12 (December)  
- `int` date: The day-of-month to represent, from 1 to 31  
- `int` hour: The hour-of-day to represent, from 0 to 23  
- `int` minute: The minute-of-hour to represent, from 0 to 59  
- `int` second: The second-of-minute to represent, from 0 to 59  
- `int` milliSecond: The milli-of-second to represent, from 0 to 999  
- `string` zoneId: The zone id of the required time-zone.If empty the system local time-zone will be used  
  
**Returns** `(time:Time|time:Error)`   
- Time object containing time and zone information or an `time:Error` if failed to create the time

**Package:** _ballerina/time_  
  
Returns the time for the given string representation based on the given format string.
  
**Params**  
- `string` data: The time text to parse  
- `(string|RFC_1123)` timeFormat: The format which is used to parse the given text  
  
**Returns** `(time:Time|time:Error)`   
- Time object containing time and zone information or an `time:Error` if failed to parse the given string
